traits.Brute: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the bugbear hits with it (included in the attack).
traits.Surprise Attack: If the bugbear surprises a creature and hits it with an attack during the first round of combat, the target takes an extra 7 (2d6) damage from the attack.

actions.Longsword: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) slashing damage, or 13 (2d10 + 2) slashing damage if used with both hands.
actions.Javelin: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage in melee or 5 (1d6 + 2) piercing damage at range.
